Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: Widgets used in the content editor are configured in the XSD. For a better clarity, OpenCms 11.0 allows you to wirte the widget configuration in highly structured way.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: See a structured XSD annotation for widget configuration

AlkaconDocumentationTopicFrame.Keywords: XSD, annotation, widget configuration, field settings
